name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】 1st generation 7th anniversary♪♪ 【 #電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言 】 [wrsUn4IQmZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where the 1st Generation members discuss the hashtag and reveal their new song title.
Performance of the new song 'Denno Pure Oshi Daisengen'.
MC segment following the song performance, expressing excitement and hope for fan enjoyment.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: じゃ、そろそろこのハッシュタグの秘密を教えちゃおうかな！
subtitles.english: Well, it's about time I tell you the secret of this hashtag!

subtitles.original: なんなのこのハッシュタグなんですが、
subtitles.english: What is this hashtag? Actually...

subtitles.original: 新曲のタイトルになってます！
subtitles.english: ...it's the title of our new song!

subtitles.original: ってことはタイトルは、電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言？
subtitles.english: So the title is 'Denno Pure Oshi Daisengen'?

subtitles.original: 大宣言！
subtitles.english: Daisengen!

subtitles.original: えー、これはいったいどんな曲なんだ？
subtitles.english: What kind of song is it, I wonder?

subtitles.original: いったいどんな感じなんだろうなー。
subtitles.english: What kind of feel will it have?

subtitles.original: 楽しみー！
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: いやー、ドキドキでございますけども、ぴゅあ推し大宣言ってことはなんかあれ、みんなの曲ってことかな？
subtitles.english: I'm nervous, but 'Pure Oshi Daisengen' means maybe it's everyone's song?

subtitles.original: ファンのみんなの曲？
subtitles.english: Like, a song for all the fans?

subtitles.original: そういうことか！
subtitles.english: Is that it?

subtitles.original: 推してくれてるよな？
subtitles.english: You're supporting us, right?

subtitles.original: 推してくれてるよな？っていう曲なのか。
subtitles.english: Is it a song about 'you're supporting us'?

subtitles.original: そう、みんなでね。この配信見てくれてるみんなが、私たちのこと...
subtitles.english: Everyone watching this stream, you all...

subtitles.original: ...推しだよね？
subtitles.english: ...consider us your favorites, right?

subtitles.original: えっ、まさか他の人によそ見なんかしてないよね？
subtitles.english: Wait, you're not looking at anyone else, are you?

subtitles.original: 四六時中、私たちのこと考えてるよね？
subtitles.english: You're thinking about us 24/7, right?

subtitles.original: ねぇ、1期生が推しだって宣言してくれるよな？
subtitles.english: You'll declare that Gen 1 are your favorites, won't you?

subtitles.original: ということで、それでは聞いてください。1期生の新曲、せーの！
subtitles.english: Alright then, please listen to it. Gen 1's new song, ready...

subtitles.original: 電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言！
subtitles.english: Denno Pure Oshi Daisengen!

subtitles.original: は～い、これから配信始めるよ　みんな見てる？
subtitles.english: Hi! We're starting the stream now! Everyone watching?

subtitles.original: 今回はコラボ配信！
subtitles.english: This time it's a collab stream!

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ？あれ？コメントの熱量　なんだか少なくない！？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't the heat in the comments a bit low?

subtitles.original: まだまだ足りない　こんなのっ～～～ん！
subtitles.english: Still not enough! Not at all!

subtitles.original: 推し変は許しませんっ！！
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you if you change your favorite!

subtitles.original: 「わ・た・し」だけに尽くしてね♡
subtitles.english: Just be devoted to 'me', okay?

subtitles.original: わたしだけに一途
subtitles.english: Be single-minded about only me.

subtitles.original: 中途半端じゃヤダヤダ　噛んじゃうぞ
subtitles.english: If you're half-hearted, I'll get mad and bite you!

subtitles.original: 他の子にちょろちょろダメですよ
subtitles.english: Stop flirting with other girls.

subtitles.original: よそ見をしたらプンプンプン　おこり！
subtitles.english: If you look away, I'll go 'boom boom boom', got it?

subtitles.original: めらめらメンヘラップ
subtitles.english: Lovey-dovey mental rap.

subtitles.original: ほっぺ膨らまし　にらめっこしましょ　あっぷっぷ～っ
subtitles.english: Pouting cheeks, let's have a staring contest. Stare...

subtitles.original: フクレっ面も可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: I'm cute even when I'm grumpy, right?

subtitles.original: 目移りはダメ！ほんとイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: Don't look at others! I really hate it.

subtitles.original: いつも観てて観てて　わたし待ってる
subtitles.english: Always watch me, watch me. I'm waiting.

subtitles.original: あなたが推してくれてる愛称の全部が
subtitles.english: The love you give me is everything.

subtitles.original: わたしをささえる栄養素♡
subtitles.english: The nutrition that supports me.

subtitles.original: LOVE YOU LOVE YOU　四六時中夢中
subtitles.english: (LOVE YOU LOVE YOU) 24/7.

subtitles.original: ねぇとってもとってもとってもとっても愛してほしい
subtitles.english: Hey, please love me very, very, very, very much.

subtitles.original: HAPPY HAPPY　最上級はきゅん
subtitles.english: (HAPPY HAPPY) The highest-grade 'Hakyun'!

subtitles.original: ほらやっぱりやっぱりやっぱりやっぱりはっきりはっきり！
subtitles.english: Look, as I thought, as I thought, as I thought, as I thought, clearly, clearly!

subtitles.original: 「推して推して」わかってたでしょ？　ぴこぴこ
subtitles.english: You understand, right? The barometer of my heart...

subtitles.original: キモチのバロメーターも超上がる
subtitles.english: ...is rising.

subtitles.original: 「ピュアピュアに　ひたむきに」単推し神推し□推し
subtitles.english: Pure Pure Pure, devotedly.

subtitles.original: もうホントにホントにホントにホントに　わかってね！！
subtitles.english: Really, really, really, really... you understand, right?

subtitles.original: おーい、みんな！ここまでついて来れてる？
subtitles.english: Hey, everyone! Can you keep up?

subtitles.original: この後もこの調子で行くよー！
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this!

subtitles.original: うりゃおい　うりゃおい　うりゃおい　うりゃおい！
subtitles.english: Uriya-oi! Uriya-oi! Uriya-oi! Uriya-oi!

subtitles.original: ちょ待って、なんで他の子のこと褒めるの？
subtitles.english: Wait, why are you praising other girls?

subtitles.original: よそ見疑惑発令中
subtitles.english: Looking away? Suspicion triggered!

subtitles.original: わたし以外も気になってるでしょ！
subtitles.english: You're curious about others besides me, aren't you?

subtitles.original: ありえないよ　ありえない！
subtitles.english: No way! Unbelievable!

subtitles.original: 他の子にちょちょちょっとだけ　よそ見したよね！？
subtitles.english: Hey hey, you looked at other girls just for a bit, didn't you?

subtitles.original: うわっマジ無理です　DEATH！
subtitles.english: Ugh, seriously impossible. DEATH!

subtitles.original: ピュア推し信者　わたし推すんじゃ　指切りしてよ
subtitles.english: If you're a 'Pure Oshi' believer, then support me, okay?

subtitles.original: ハリセンボン×1000
subtitles.english: Pinky swear 1000 times!

subtitles.original: 心変わりしたらほんとに
subtitles.english: If you change your heart, seriously...

subtitles.original: 「推して推して」拗ねる、怒る、泣いちゃうからねー！
subtitles.english: ...I'll pout, get mad, and cry!

subtitles.original: 推し変はしてないね？
subtitles.english: You haven't changed your favorite, right?

subtitles.original: 「わ・た・し」だけに尽くしてる！！！
subtitles.english: Be devoted to 'me'!

subtitles.original: ほらほら　コメントが愛に溢れている
subtitles.english: Look, the comments are overflowing with love.

subtitles.original: 瀕死のHPみるみる回復
subtitles.english: Restoring my critical HP quickly.

subtitles.original: チート級レベちなパワーチャージ
subtitles.english: Super high level, power charge!

subtitles.original: ごめごめごめちょ　ごめごめめちょ
subtitles.english: Gome-gome gomecho, gome-gome mecho.

subtitles.original: LOVE YOU LOVE YOU　四六時中夢中
subtitles.english: (LOVE YOU LOVE YOU) 24/7.

subtitles.original: ねぇいっぱいっぱいっぱいっぱい愛してほしい
subtitles.english: Hey, love me more, more, more, more!

subtitles.original: HAPPY HAPPY　最上級はきゅん
subtitles.english: (HAPPY HAPPY) The highest-grade 'Hakyun'!

subtitles.original: もううっとりうっとりうっとりうっとり　にっこりにっこり！
subtitles.english: Enchanted, enchanted, enchanted, enchanted, smiling, smiling!

subtitles.original: 「ピュアピュアに　ひたむきに」わたしのた日々、日々、推しごと励んでくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for working hard on your 'oshi activities' for me every day.

subtitles.original: 「ピュアピュアに　ひたむきに」単推し神推し□推し
subtitles.english: Pure Pure Pure, devotedly.

subtitles.original: そうぜったいぜったいぜったいぜったい... お願いね！！！
subtitles.english: Absolutely, absolutely, absolutely... please!

subtitles.original: このこのこのこの！
subtitles.english: This, this, this, this!

subtitles.original: ん～～～、このこのこのこの！
subtitles.english: Mmm, this, this, this, this!

subtitles.original: 銀河の果てまで愛して（ほしい）
subtitles.english: Love me until the end of the galaxy!

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Yay!

subtitles.original: ということで、新曲でしたー！
subtitles.english: So that was our new song!

subtitles.original: 可愛かったねー。めちゃくちゃ可愛いし、
subtitles.english: It was so cute! It's super cute and...

subtitles.original: なんかね、もう『推し』って感じで。みんなにも、なかなか...
subtitles.english: ...it really feels like an 'oshi' song. I hope...

subtitles.original: ...ぜひ歌ったり踊ったりね、いっぱい楽しんでもらえたら嬉しいなという一曲になってるんだけど、どうだった？
subtitles.english: ...everyone will sing and dance along and enjoy it a lot! What did you think?

subtitles.original: いやもう、やっぱ楽しいね、この曲ね。
subtitles.english: It really is a fun song!

subtitles.original: 前作が結構、白上のど趣味な曲『シークレットガーデン』作らせていただいたんだけど、今回は...
subtitles.english: Our last song 'Secret Garden' was quite tailored to my tastes, but this time...
